items.title: Meridian Analytics ‚Äî Q1 Proposal Deadline
items.description: Final proposal for Meridian's Q1 brand strategy engagement due by end of day. Pricing sheet needs sign-off from Marcus Rivera before submission.

items.title: TechBridge Solutions ‚Äî Campaign Launch Prep
items.description: LinkedIn + Google Ads campaign going live tomorrow morning. Need to approve final creatives and confirm audience segments with their team.

items.title: CloudNine Ventures ‚Äî Urgent Investor Deck Feedback
items.description: CEO Priya Sharma needs feedback on revised investor deck before their 4 PM board meeting. Focus on messaging and market positioning slides.

items.title: DataFlow Inc ‚Äî Billing Discrepancy Resolution
items.description: DataFlow's AP department flagged a $2,400 discrepancy on January invoice. Need to reconcile hours log and send corrected invoice today.

items.title: TechBridge Solutions ‚Äî Content Strategy Overhaul
items.description: Redesigning their entire content pipeline: blog cadence, thought leadership pieces, and LinkedIn strategy. Currently drafting editorial calendar for Q2.

items.title: CloudNine Ventures ‚Äî Social Media Campaign
items.description: Managing their Series B announcement campaign across LinkedIn, Twitter/X, and TechCrunch contributed article. 12 posts scheduled, 8 drafted.

items.title: Apex Dynamics ‚Äî Leadership Workshop Prep
items.description: Preparing half-day workshop on 'Marketing-Led Growth for B2B SaaS' for Apex's leadership team. Slide deck 60% complete, need to finalize case studies.

items.title: Meridian Analytics ‚Äî Competitive Market Research
items.description: Deep dive into Meridian's competitive landscape. Analyzing 6 direct competitors across pricing, positioning, and feature gaps. Interview with their VP Sales scheduled.

items.title: CRM & Pipeline Updates
items.description: Weekly CRM hygiene: update deal stages, log recent conversations, and tag new leads from last week's networking event.

items.title: Monthly Newsletter ‚Äî March Issue Draft
items.description: Writing the March edition of 'The Growth Signal' newsletter. Theme: AI-driven marketing automation. Subscriber list at 2,847.

items.title: DataFlow Inc ‚Äî SEO Audit Implementation
items.description: Implementing recommendations from January's SEO audit. Currently working on technical fixes (site speed, schema markup) and content gap analysis.

items.title: GrowthCon 2026 ‚Äî Speaker Proposal
items.description: Drafting talk proposal: 'From Metrics to Meaning: Building Marketing Dashboards That Drive Decisions.' Abstract done, working on outline and bio.

items.title: Vantage Partners ‚Äî New Client Onboarding
items.description: Onboarding new client. Discovery phase: stakeholder interviews scheduled this week, brand audit in progress, setting up shared workspace.

items.title: Meridian Analytics ‚Äî Q1 Proposal Draft
items.description: Completed draft of the Q1 brand strategy proposal. Needs final review of pricing tiers and scope of deliverables before sending to Marcus Rivera.

items.title: TechBridge Solutions ‚Äî January Analytics Report
items.description: Monthly performance report covering paid campaigns, organic traffic, and conversion metrics. Key highlight: 34% increase in MQLs. Needs proofread.

items.title: CloudNine Ventures ‚Äî Contract Amendment
items.description: Expanding scope to include investor relations comms for Series B. Amendment adds 15 hrs/month. Legal reviewed, waiting on my final check of deliverables language.

items.title: Apex Dynamics ‚Äî Case Study Draft
items.description: Draft case study: 'How Apex Dynamics Increased Pipeline 3x with Content-Led Growth.' Awaiting client approval on quotes and metrics used.

items.title: Q1 Quarterly Business Review ‚Äî Prep
items.description: Prepare Q1 review deck: revenue summary, client retention, pipeline forecast, and capacity planning for Q2.

items.title: Adobe Creative Cloud ‚Äî License Renewal
items.description: Annual Creative Cloud renewal. Consider upgrading to team plan if bringing on contractor for CloudNine project.

items.title: Vantage Partners ‚Äî Kickoff Meeting
items.description: Formal project kickoff with Vantage leadership team. Agenda: project scope review, timeline walkthrough, communication cadence.

items.title: 2025 Tax Documents ‚Äî Accountant Submission
items.description: Compile and send all 2025 business expense receipts, 1099s, and revenue reports to accountant (Lisa Park at Greenfield CPA).

items.title: DataFlow Inc ‚Äî January Retainer Deliverables
items.description: Completed all January retainer deliverables: 4 blog posts, 12 social posts, monthly analytics review, and SEO recommendations report.

items.title: TechBridge Solutions ‚Äî Brand Guidelines v2
items.description: Delivered updated brand guidelines including new messaging framework, tone of voice documentation, and visual identity system refresh.

items.title: GrowthCon 2026 ‚Äî Ticket & Travel Booked
items.description: Conference registration confirmed. Flights and hotel booked for Apr 8-10 in Austin. Early bird rate secured.

items.title: Personal Website ‚Äî Portfolio Update
items.description: Added 3 new case studies to portfolio page, updated testimonials section, and refreshed headshot. PageSpeed score improved to 94.

items.title: CloudNine Ventures ‚Äî Buyer Persona Research
items.description: Completed buyer persona research with 8 customer interviews. Delivered persona deck with 4 primary segments and messaging recommendations.

items.title: Podcast Launch ‚Äî 'The Growth Signal'
items.description: Planning a companion podcast to the newsletter. Deferred to Q2 ‚Äî current client load too heavy. Have outline for first 6 episodes.

items.title: Zapier Workflow Overhaul
items.description: Current automation stack is getting messy ‚Äî 23 zaps, some redundant. Need to audit, consolidate, and document. Pushing to late March.

items.title: Client Referral Program Design
items.description: Design a formal referral incentive program for existing clients. Had initial ideas but deprioritized in favor of direct business development.

items.title: Nexus Digital ‚Äî Rebrand Project
items.description: Full rebrand engagement completed in January. Delivered new brand identity, messaging framework, and launch campaign. Client thrilled ‚Äî left testimonial.

items.title: 2025 Year-End Business Planning
items.description: Completed annual review and 2026 planning: revenue targets, service offerings update, pricing restructure, and capacity model.

items.title: BrightPath Education ‚Äî Engagement Closed
items.description: 3-month marketing strategy engagement completed. Handed off to their internal team with full playbook and 90-day execution plan.
